name: test-proxy
description: minimal proxy server for codesandbox testing
author: Commerce 42

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -s all 'node proxy-server.js --mode development' 'yarn vite --mode development'
scripts.prod: concurrently -k -s all 'node proxy-server.js --mode production' 'yarn vite build' 'yarn vite --mode production'
